question: I would like to make up for my missed Salah
answer:
QUESTION
I would like to make up for my missed Salah and you said "An easy method of fulfilling your Qadhaas is that from now on and after each Fardh Salaat of the day, read one Qadhaa Slaats of the same kind, e.g. after you discharge the Dhuhr of today, just read one Dhuhr Qadhaa Salaat of 4 Rakaats" What i would like to know is weather you can read a Qadhaa Salaat for Fajr after you pray your Fajr Salaat?
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to perform any Qadhaa Salaat after the Fajr Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
